1110100110101100 0111010000001000 1 -> sum: 0101110110110101, cout: 1

0010100110011101 0110000010001111 0 -> sum: 1000101000101100, cout: 0
0010001101100010 0001111000101111 0 -> sum: 0100000110010001, cout: 0
